product_name: Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Vest - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: On blustery approaches, chilly rock routes and full-on alpine missions, the men's Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Vest takes the edge off thanks to Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R). Polartec Wind Pro with Hardface(R) technology and a durable water repellent finish protects your front torso from wind, moisture and abrasion. Back and sides are Polartec Power Dry(R) fleece for superior stretch, warmth and moisture management. Warm brushed-fleece interior moves moisture quickly to the fabric face. Microfleece-lined collar, chin guard, cuffs and hem. Zippered chest pocket and 2 zippered handwarmer pockets are pack- and harness-compatible. Men's Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Vest has seamless shoulders for pack-wearing comfort. Closeout.
short_description: On blustery approaches, chilly rock routes and full-on alpine missions, the men's Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Vest takes the edge off thanks to Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R).
